channel.title: Link Shellextension
channel.description: News and announcements of Link Shellextension.

item.title: ln.exe 2.932 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Multisource aka --destination in combination with --mirror did not work.

item.title: LSE 3.935 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • With SE_CREATE_SYMBOLICLINK assigned to a user, UAC dialog was raised anytime after second attempt.

item.title: ln.exe 2.931 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Symbolic Link creation required admin even in developer mode.

item.title: LSE 3.934 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• German Translation of Documentation.
  • Pressing F1 in LSEConfig crashed it. Fixed.

item.title: ln.exe 2.930 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Directories can be specified as destination with normal file or symbolic linking.

item.title: ln.exe 2.928 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a race condition, when ln was called without --progress. Introduced in 2.9.2.6

item.title: ln.exe 2.926 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • --progress also shows days if expected duration is bigger than 24hours

item.title: LSE 3.933 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • During Hardlink/Symbolic Link Clone pressing Cancel didn't have an impact.

item.title: LSE 3.932 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Progress bar prediction has been improved.

item.title: ln.exe 2.925 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The --progress calculation ran into overshoots, showing e.g. 177%.
  • ln.exe now maintains its chocolatey package.
  • ln.exe is public on gitlab.
  • ln.exe is signed with a code signing certificate.
  • ln.exe is on gitlab.com. For now only private, but hope to change this soon.
  • --delete now also deletes the starting directory.
  • Division by zero with --progress in some situations.
  • The --delete option has been modified to stop on outer reparse boundaries.
  • The --follow option has been introduced to follow accross outer reparse boundaries during --delete.

item.title: LSE 3.931 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed crash when username was > 20 chars as non-admin during symbolic link drop.
  • Link ShellExtension now maintains its chocolatey package.
  • Link ShellExtension is public on gitlab.

item.title: LSE 3.930 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• For non Admin users under Windows 10, the explorer did not restart after install
  • During custom icon change one was asked to close lots of dependant apps, which is uneccessary. Reboot Explorer.exe is enough.

item.title: LSE 3.929 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Lots of strings very wrong. Introduced with 3.9.2.8

item.title: LSE 3.928 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Removed 'Delete Junction' from main menu.
  • Improved menu hydraulics, e.g. once can not create Smart Copies of Symbolic Link Files.
  • Adapted check for Redistributables to VS2017 and Windows 10.

item.title: LSE 3.927 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• On non NTFS drive files, could no be selected as Link Source. Introduced with 3921
  • Unmount volume did not work, when elevation was needed.
  • New Windows 10 screenshots for docu and docu streamlining.

item.title: LSE 3.926 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Signed with a code sign certificate
  • During Replace Junction/Symbolic Link/Mountpoint the original attributes got lost
  • The Link Properties Tab showed relative symbolic link dirs as absolute
  • The Link Properties Tab did not show up on dangling Junctions
  • Creation of file symbolic links didn't work in protected folders like 'Program Files' with Developer Mode on.
  • Replacement Junction/Symbolic Link didn't work on dangling Junction/Symbolic Link.

item.title: LSE 3.925 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• UAChelper mixed up relative and absolute link creation. Introduced with 3920
  • Added Ukranian localization, Finish localisation for missing texts

item.title: LSE 3.924 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Cross Drive Drops didn't work. Introduced with 3921

item.title: LSE 3.923 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Properties Dialog could cause a crash on changing junction targets
  • Autorename had a flaw when having more than 9 files with same name in a directory

item.title: LSE 3.922 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Backup mode was broken. Introduced with 3921

item.title: LSE 3.921 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Introduce Copy Symbolic Link/Junction/Mountpoint

item.title: LSE 3.920 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Changes of non-admin users to e.g. symlink relativ/absolute had no effect. Fixed the misconception. What a mess
  • LSE is on gitlab.com. For now only private, but hope to change this soon.

item.title: ln.exe 2.874 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The --follow option has been introduced to follow accross outer reparse boundaries during --delete.
  • Matching the first character of an wildcard expression with --exclude --include was not correct
  • Empty lines on the filter file for wildcard expression caused an selection of *
  • DeloreanHanoi/Deloreancopy now use ln --delete instead of rd. Thx to Dietmar Kleiner
  • Wildcard expression didn't work correctly when using ~
  • DeloreanHanoi.bat can now also copy save whole drives, e.g. DeloreanHanoi.bat g:\ z:\save 5
  • Fixed too many links error handling during --mirror.

item.title: LSE 3.913 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• SmartMirror in LSE had problem with nested reparse points
  • The symbolic replacement mechansism was broken for the elevated use-case. Caused by 3.8.7.2

item.title: ln.exe 2.913 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Division by zero with --progress in some situations.
  • The --delete option has been modified to stop on outer reparse boundaries.
  • The --follow option has been introduced to follow accross outer reparse boundaries during --delete.

item.title: LSE 3.911 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Improved the progress estimation for the progressbar and introduced the Windows7 progress dialog

item.title: ln.exe 2.911 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The 32bit version uses Wow64DisableWow64FsRedirection to access System32 properly
  • Matching the first character of an wildcard expression with --exclude --include was not correct
  • Empty lines on the filter file for wildcard expression caused an selection of *
  • The --progress option should be more accurate and shows the remaining files

item.title: LSE 3.910 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Improved the progress estimation for the progressbar and introduced the Windows7 progress dialog

item.title: LSE 3.902 XP Support ditched.
item.content:encoded:
• With upgrading the compiler to VS2017 and adapting WINNT_WINVER to 0x602 the XP support accidently was removed. Currently I am trying to restore it. Well this basically worked, but in some use-cases LSE crashes under XP, which is normal durcng development. But, and now comes the point, one can hardly debug such situations under XP. Remote Debugger for vs2017 does not work, and analysis of dumps is cumbersome.
    So I'll give it a try but one outcome could be to drop LSE XP support in the most recent versions. The command line tools work... at least at a first glance
  • On the other hand the good news is that the new progess bar now works in all use cases in my dev environment.

item.title: ln.exe 2.902 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Updated the compiler settings

item.title: LSE 3.902 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed crash in LSEConfig, when it replaced the texts upon startup
  • Removed vcredist-vs2005 check from installer

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.102 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• [Internal] but important change from VS2005 (sic) to VS2017. Basically everything compiled smoothly except for the heap, thus...
  • [Internal] Removed the Rockall fast heap. This was neccessary, but also a big performance gain. Memory allocation is 2 times faster, and memory deletion is 10 times faster. Memory allocation is crucial for the core of Dupemerge.
  • [Internal] Dropped Itanium configuration, since VS2017 does not support it anymore, and I am sure there is no Itanium hardware out in the wild anymore.

item.title: LSE 3.900 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• [Internal] but important change from VS2005 (sic) to VS2017. Basically everything compiled smoothly except for the heap, thus...
  • [Internal] Removed the Rockall fast heap. This was neccessary, but also a big performance gain. Memory allocation is 2 times faster, and memory deletion is 10 times faster. Memory allocation is crucial for the core of ln.exe and LSE.
  • [Internal] Dropped Itanium configuration, since VS2017 does not support it anymore, and I am sure there is no Itanium hardware out in the wild anymore.

item.title: ln.exe 2.900 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• [Internal] but important change from VS2005 (sic) to VS2017. Basically everything compiled smoothly except for the heap, thus...
  • [Internal] Removed the Rockall fast heap. This was neccessary, but also a big performance gain. Memory allocation is 2 times faster, and memory deletion is 10 times faster. Memory allocation is crucial for the core of ln.exe and LSE.
  • [Internal] Dropped Itanium configuration, since VS2017 does not support it anymore, and I am sure there is no Itanium hardware out in the wild anymore.
  • Added the --supportfs option.
  • DeloreanHanoi/Deloreancopy now use ln --delete instead of rd. Thx to Dietmar Kleiner
  • Wildcard expression didn't work correctly when using ~

item.title: LSE 3.872 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Third party filesystems can be configured.

item.title: LSE 3.870 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• With Windows 10 LSE shows flat icons for symlinks, hardlinks and junctions. Thx to Yaroslav for the icons.
  • The overlay icon for Junctions didn't show up at all with Windows 7.
  • Symbolic Link creation is now possible unelevated for Windows 10/14972.
  • The property dialog for hardlinks when used on substituted drives showed wrong path for the siblings.

item.title: ln.exe 2.873 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• DeloreanHanoi.bat can now also copy save whole drives, e.g. DeloreanHanoi.bat g:\ z:\save 5
  • Fixed too many links error handling during --mirror.
  • Deletion of delorean sets properly implemented.
  • Added the --delete option.
  • --deeppathdelete can also delete single files.
  • Improved error reporting during --merge, when files could not be merged.

item.title: LSE 3.869 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The Overlay icons didn't show up under 32bit applications.

item.title: ln.exe 2.872 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The --merge option can now merge delorean backup sets.

item.title: ln.exe 2.870 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Avoids fragmentation during copy operations and thus faster on large files.

item.title: LSE 3.868 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• NTFS filesystem fragmentation decreased and thus copying should be faster
  • Cancel works when pressed during copying of (large) files.
  • Creation of hardlinks in UAC protected folders caused an error message, even if the hardlink was created.

item.title: ln.exe 2.871 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • With --progress ln.exe could crash due to progress calculation.

item.title: ln.exe 2.870 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Avoids fragmentation during copy operations and thus faster on large files.

item.title: ln.exe 2.869 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • With --progress the remaining time during --delorean was calculated wrong.

item.title: ln.exe 2.868 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The --progress option shows the progress on the console.

item.title: ln.exe 2.867 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Take 2: Files with different compression state between source and target were flagged as erroneous during --mirror.
  • Hardlinks were broken on copy when the source path was given via either VolumeGUID or Windows Namespace
  • In --backup mode, when used with --anchor, dangling junctions were not copied properly.
  • Wrong drive letter shown with --list on subst'd drives.
  • Minor updates to deloreancopy.bat and DeloreanHanoi.bat regarding script error handling.
  • Realtive symbolic links on absolute symbolic links to a different drive, were not created properly.
  • Relative symbolic links on UNC path were recreated with wrong target during SmartCopy.

item.title: LSE 3.867 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Realtive symbolic links on absolute symbolic links to a different drive, were not created properly.
  • Added Greek localization. Thanks to George Malamas!
  • SmartMove didn't work when Backup Mode was enabled.
  • Runs again with Windows 2000 (Flaw introduced with 3.8.6.6).
  • The Vcredist check is back by default, but can be skipped by passing /noredist during install via commandline.
  • Relative symbolic links on UNC path were recreated with wrong target.

item.title: LSE 3.866 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Prerequisites still checked by installer with Windows10.

item.title: LSE 3.865 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Prerequisites install not needed with Windows 10, thus do not check for prerequisites under Windows 10.

item.title: LSE 3.864 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • On Windows10 systems which have been upgraded from Windows7 the enumeration of hardlinks siblings via the property page takes very long.

item.title: LSE 3.863 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a crash in W10 when closing the properties dialog on junctions/symlinks.

item.title: LSE 3.862 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a crash, when files were dropped from Bandzip to the desktop.
  • Added localization for Korean. Thanks to Mireado from Korea!

item.title: ln.exe 2.865 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Added the --1023safe option.
  • The --mirror option didn't show the number of removed items in the summary.
  • The output can be in Json now by issuing the --json option.
  • Files with different compression state between source and target were flagged as erroneous during --mirror.

item.title: ln.exe 2.864 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Added handling for unsupported reparse points.

item.title: LSE 3.861 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• In a rare situation only the first symbolic link of a smart-copy was linked incorrectly.
  • The Auto Rename functionality didn't work in rare situations. Fixed for XP and Windows7/8/10
  • Adaptions for Windows 10 Tech Preview 9841/9926.

item.title: ln.exe 2.863 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Wait time needed during Delorean Copy due to SMB2 Cache issues.
  • Reading arguments from file for --ex/include didn't work.
  • --ex/include failed with files containing ()[]{}-+$.
  • The combination of --anchor and --mirror was broken. The result was as if it was --copy.
  • The --mirror option didn't copy ACLs.

item.title: ln.exe 2.861 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The regular expression parser didn't use the extended regular expressions mode, but only the (obsolete) basic regular expression mode.
  • Accessing drives via Windows Namespace in \\?\GLOBALROOT\Device is also possible.

item.title: LSE 3.860 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Files with a size beeing a multiple of 16777216 were copied properly, but in the logfile generated an error message even if there was none.
  • The progress bar didn't increase properly during Smartmirror if the files were the same.

item.title: ln.exe 2.860 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• DeloreanCopy with network drives as destination crashed in certain situation.
  • SmartClone on empty folder created empty file for destination folder.
  • UNC path in some situations were chopped at the begining in the log-ouput.
  • Certain Unicode command line arguments could drive the command line parser crazy.
  • Hardlink Clone Mirror failed if files were already existing.
  • Several options support taking its content from a referenced file.
  • Added the --anchor.
  • SymbolicLink Clone Mirror sometimes removed and created symlinks unneccessarily.

item.title: ln.exe 2.852 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Added Hardlink Clone Mirror option: --recursive combined with --mirror now mirrors hardlink link clones.

item.title: ln.exe 2.851 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Tweaked DeloreanHanoi.bat, a way to use ln.exe for the Tower of Hanoi backup rotation scheme.
  • Files with a size beeing a multiple of 16777216 were copied properly, but generated an error message even if there was none.

item.title: LSE 3.851 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • UNC path as Link Source for SmartCopy/Mirror/Delorean/SymbolicLinkClone now work.

item.title: LSE 3.850 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The Backup Mode arrived to LSE.
  • LSE produced logfiles with LF but not CR/LF.
  • Junctions/Symbolic Links/Mountpoints ACLs are preserved when the target is changed either via Replacement functions or editing from the Link Properties.
  • Japanese translation for LSEConfig.
  • The target of mountpoints can be changed from Link Properties.
  • LSE now can handle Mountpoints during SmartXXX/Delorean operations.
  • WindowsXP: Symbolic links across drives didn't work.
  • WindowsXP: Symbolic links to Volume GUIDs didn't work.
  • WindowsXP: Symbolic links between very long path didn't work.
  • WindowsXP: Lots of tweaks here and there.

item.title: ln.exe 2.850 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Tackled with the some more symlink and Windows XP issues.
  • ln.exe now can handle mountpoints during SmartXXX operations.
  • Documented the --destination option.
  • WindowsXP: Symbolic links across drives didn't work.
  • WindowsXP: Symbolic links to Volume GUIDs didn't work.
  • WindowsXP: Symbolic links between very long path didn't work.
  • WindowsXP: Lots of tweaks here and there.

item.title: Link Shell Extension 15th Anniversary
item.content:encoded: • Lets celebrate!.

item.title: ln.exe 2.834 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed various issues under XP when symlinks were used.
  • Resource and speed improvments in --backup mode.
  • Listing of hardlink siblings with --traditional didn't show all siblings, when symbolic links were involved.
  • The .html docu has no .html format errors.

item.title: LSEConfig 3.8xx Japanese translations for needed
item.content:encoded: • LSEConfig needs a Japanese translation, which is about 40 strings. Anyone volunteers? Drop me a line to hermann.schinagl@gmx.net

item.title: ln.exe 2.831 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Added the --noads option.
  • Added the --noea option.
  • Errors during copying ADS are marked with the t charachter.
  • Errors during copying EA Records are marked with the e character.

item.title: LSE 3.791 Beta Version Available.
item.content:encoded: • LSE now can be switched into Backup Mode via LSEConfig. This is a Beta Version for public test and feedback

item.title: ln.exe 2.830 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• With --backup Encrypted Files are copied too.
  • Junctions on mapped network drives are handled properly during all operations.

item.title: ln.exe 2.810 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The --copy, --mirror and --delorean also copy sparse files and alternative sparse streams.
  • Fixed a bug during copy, when a file was already there and the new file was smaller, it didn't copy over completley.

item.title: ln.exe 2.800 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Introduced the --backup switch which also copies ACLs.
  • Introduced the --keepsymlinkrelation switch.
  • The --output option produced logfiles with LF but not CR/LF.

item.title: LinkshellExtension French Documentation.
item.content:encoded: • French Documentation

item.title: ln.exe --backup 2.7.9.201/Beta2.01.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a crucial memory leal.

item.title: ln.exe --backup 2.7.9.200/Beta2.
item.content:encoded:
• ACLs and EA records are copied from directories.
  • Timestamp handling improved.
  • Regression test passed. Get it from here

item.title: ln.exe --backup goes Beta.
item.content:encoded: • ln.exe is able to copy ACLs, EA Records, Alternative Datastreams on files or directory. Modify your ln.exe invocation with --backup option, e.g. ln.exe --backup --copy SrcPath DestPath. Get it from here

item.title: LSE 3.759 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• A changed file attribute didn't cause the file to be treated as changed during all SmartXXX/Delorean functions.
  • Symbolic Link Clones always created absolute symlinks regardless of the LSE Settings
  • The LastWriteTime, CreationTime and LastAccessTime for files/folders/junctions/symlinks is restored during SmartMirror or DeloreanCopy.

item.title: ln.exe 2.759 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Symbolic Link Clones always created absolute symlinks regardless of the command line args.

item.title: ln.exe 2.758 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Arguments to common operations support \\?\Volume{GUID} as arguments.
  • The LastWriteTime, CreationTime and LastAccessTime for files/folders/junctions/symlinks is restored during --mirror or --delorean.
  • Is able to delete very long path with the --deeppathdelete option.

item.title: LSE 3.754 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fix 2: With Delorean Copy when elevated via symlink.exe in rare situations symlinks could get deleted in the source. Ugly. Sorry!

item.title: LSE 3.752 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • With Delorean Copy when elevated via symlink.exe in rare situations symlinks could get deleted in the source. Ugly. Sorry!

item.title: ln.exe 2.756 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a bug in --exclude, which prevented excluding files along a path.
  • Fixed a bug in --include, which prevented including files along a path.

item.title: ln.exe 2.754 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The --list function didn't return error messages when used on UNC pathes.
  • Just --symbolic without argument caused a crash.
  • ln --copy x:\ x caused the folder x to be completley invisible, because GetFileAttributes() runs havoc on root dirs, e.g h:\.
  • The UNC Support has been improved and supports hardlink preservation for --copy, --delorean, --mirror.
  • Introduced the --probefs option.
  • The shadow copy .cmd file for vss shares via UNC name has been adapted.
  • Junctions can have now volume names like \\?\Volume{GUID}\tmp as target.
  • Symbolic Links can have now volume names like \\?\Volume{GUID}\tmp as target.
  • Updated the documentation, and structured it based on alphabetical order of command line switches.

item.title: ln.exe 2.753 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Introduced a sanity check for broken NTFS implementations.
  • Introduced On the Fly DupeMerge.

item.title: LSE 3.751 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Dead Junctions to a different drive could lead to not detecting hardlinks during all operations. Very Nasty, but no dataloss caused.

item.title: ln.exe 2.751 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Dead Junctions to a different drive could lead to not detecting hardlinks during all operations. Very Nasty, but no dataloss caused.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.07 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Dead Junctions to a different drive could lead to not detecting hardlinks during all operations. Very Nasty, but no dataloss caused.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.06 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Introduced a sanity check for broken NTFS implementations.
  • When hardlinking a tupel of equal files, the tupels common date is the date of the oldest file of the tupel.
  • The statistics is printed after the detailed log and not before.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.05 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a crash during cleanup at the very end when all was correctly done.

item.title: LSE 3.750 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Columnprovider shows now shrinked path for junctions if the path is longer than 32characters.
  • On some machines LSEConfig always showed up with French. Introduced with 3.749
  • LSEConfig localized to French.

item.title: LSE 3.749 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The handling of the compression bit during copying/mirroring/deloreaning for files and directories was broken.
  • Draging from or Droping to zipped folders caused an explorer crash.

item.title: ln.exe 2.749 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The handling of the compression bit during copying/mirroring/deloreaning for files and directories was broken.

item.title: ln.exe 2.748 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a problem in UNC name resolution, when the UNC share was created by the Volume Shadow Service.
  • Added the vss_unc.cmd to create Volume Shadow Service backups via a UNC share.

item.title: LSE 3.748 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Enabled Link Shell Extension on ReFs volumes.
  • Added a Swedish localisation. Thanks to Mikael Grnholm.
  • Added a Turkish localisation. Thanks to Memet.
  • Added a Czech localisation. Thanks to Ashus
  • Added a Slovak localisation. Thanks to RobertS
  • LSEConfig has been localised.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.04 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a crash when files were larger than 16gb.

item.title: LSE 3.747 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • symlink.exe was missing in the 32bit version of the x64 install.

item.title: LSE 3.746 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Tested with Windows8, and thus updated the documentation.
  • The x64 version now contains also a 32bit version in one unified install.
  • Deinstallation left over a few registry keys.
  • During installation not all processes were detected, which blocked the installation.

item.title: ln.exe 2.746 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Added kind of 'clonemirror' option: --symbolic combined with --mirror now mirrors symbolic link clones.
  • Extended the DeloreanCopy.bat with a 'number of keep-entry' argument. Thx to MathiasB for providing it.
  • The filters for --includeXXX or --excludeXXX are applied on source and destination during --mirror and --delorean.

item.title: LSE 3.745 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The eunmeration of hardlink siblings didn't work under XP, when the root dir of a drive had to be traversed.

item.title: LSE 3.742 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The OS Version detection during installation went wrong on certain machines causing symlinke.exe missing from the installation.

item.title: ln.exe 2.745 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Directory matches with --excludedir did not work properly with every expression.
  • Introduced the --include* options.
  • Added the --skipfiles option.
  • Sorted the options in the doku alphabetically.

item.title: LSE 3.741 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• During SmartCopy/SmartMirror/DeloreanCopy the type (absolute/relative) of symbolic link relation is kept in the destination.
  • During SmartCopy/SmartMirror/DeloreanCopy the Compression Attribute is copied too.
  • The check for prerequisites during install is more accurate aka takes mfc80.dll into account.
  • During un-install it is also checked if the hardlinkshellext.dll is held by some process.
  • Fixed a problem during SmartMirror when a directory changed into a file or vice versa from one mirror to the next and had exactly the same name.

item.title: ln.exe 2.741 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• --timetolerance was introduced so that during --mirror and --delorean timestamp comparison is fuzzy.
  • Fixed a problem with --mirror when a directory changed into a file or vice versa from one mirror to the next and had exactly the same name.
  • Compressed files are handled during SmartCopy/SmartMirror and DeloreanCopy.

item.title: LSE 3.740 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• For Junctions or Symbolic Links the Target field can be edited in the Properties Dialog.
  • LSE elevates the creation of hardlinks in system protected directories, e.g.: %systemroot%.
  • LSE now offers all its function also in the Library folder.
  • If enabled LSE summarizes the ouptut of operations in a log file.
  • Fixed a crash related to UNC path and Overlay Icons.
  • The progress bar showed wrong/incomplete filename-path combinations during operations on large files.
  • Symbolic links to mapped network drives can be created now via LSE.
  • Replacement functions can used to repair broken junctions/symbolic links/mountpoints.

item.title: ln.exe 2.740 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Memory Deallocation at the very end of ln.exe took ages when operating on millions of items.
  • During --mirror files in the destination with ReadOnly Attribute on were not mirrored.
  • --mirror didn't report errors at the end.

item.title: ln.exe 2.720 extended the documentation.
item.content:encoded: • Added a section to the documentation of ln.exe how to use the Volume Snapshot Service with ln.exe to create consistent backups

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.03 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Error message is printed out if the 1024 hardlink limit per file is exceeded.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.02 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The --output option didn't redirect output properly.
  • Improved summary statistics

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.01 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The --output option didn't redirect output properly.
  • The number of new Dupegroups was reported non deterministic when huge amounts of files were scanned, but always calculated correct.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 1.0 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• In rare situations not all dupes of a group were merged into one group but in e.g two groups.
  • Fast file enumeration is now the default.
  • Little tweaks here and there, but in general a long journey has ended and this version qualifies for a 1.0 release

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 0.9998 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Added the --output option
  • Added a error reporting capabilty.
  • Added the --exclude option
  • Fixed the statistic output so that only new dupegroups are printed out.

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 0.9996 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a problem where files larger than 4gb were never detected as dupes.
  • Files larger than 4gb sometimes might have caused the 'Could map view of file' error message
  • In general filesize is not a limiting factor anymore

item.title: DupeMerge.exe 0.9995 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a bug which caused the message 'Could not map view of file' to show up on certain files, causing the files to be not part of the deduping process
  • Fixed a problem, where dupemerge did not find all dupes.
  • Time during operation is printed in readable hh:mm:ss.mss
  • Dupemerge now uses the fast file enumerator which is also used in LSE and ln.exe. This speeds up file enumeration by the factor 10+

item.title: ln.exe 2.720 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a problem with --truesize when used under Windows XP.

item.title: LSE 3.719 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed deployment problems for the Win32bit version.

item.title: LSE 3.718 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The status of the privilege for Symbolic Link Creation is checked, so that UAC can be avoided

item.title: LSE 3.717 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • With XP and the symlink driver installed the Delete Junction menue didn't show up.

item.title: LSE 3.716 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• The target of the Symbolic Liks or Junctions can be edited in the properties dialog.
  • Non administrators could not create symbolic links.

item.title: LSE 3.715 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• LSEConfig has an About Box, which shows the version of Link Shellextension.
  • Replace Symbolic Link failed when not elevated.
  • Replace Symbolic Link always created absolute symbolic links regardless of the settings when not elevated.
  • Drop Symbolic Link sometimes did not create absolute links when needed in certain situations.
  • The installer now shows the language of the installed OS as default.
  • The installer provides more info in Control Panel/Program and Features.

item.title: LSE 3.714 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • The installer came up with Chinese as default installation language.

item.title: LSE 3.712 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a problem with the creation of absolute symbolic links to directories.

item.title: ln.exe 2.712 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Added a --truesize option.
  • More detailed reporting when the restore of a dangling junction under windows XP fails.

item.title: LSE 3.710 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Overlay Icons for symbolic links under Window XP are available now.
  • Fixed a few bugs related to WindowsXP and symbolic links handling.
  • Elevation to symlink.exe now happens only if UAC is on, or the elevation is really neccesary.

item.title: LSE 3.700 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• When working on mapped network drives via SMB or CFIS, as many NAS boxes do, LSE uses a more traditional enumeration mode and this will copy files ( which it did not in any case ).
  • Multiple locations can be selected and the location are treated as a common root with respect to hardlinks/junctions/symbolic links.
  • Nested junctions and symbolic links ( aka junctions on junction on junctions ... ) are now properly restored in any situation.
  • Smartmove had problems with relative symbolic links in rare situations.
  • Italian translation updated.
  • Support for symbolic links under WXP.
  • Can handle subst.exe created driveletters.

item.title: LSE 3.653 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Symbolic Link Icon Overlays installation in registry was wrong, causing problems with the green arrow for symlinks.

item.title: LSE 3.652 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed issue with Windows 8 installation.

item.title: ln.exe 2.681 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed the problem of dangling junctions/symbolic links caused in certain situations with the multiple source option.

item.title: ln.exe 2.680 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Introduced a traditional mode for SmartCopy, DeloreanCopy and SmartClone when used on network shared implementing SMBV10 (NAS boxes).
  • During SmartCopy, DeloreanCopy and SmartClone nested junctions/symbolic link directories were not processed correctly if alphabetical order was bad.
  • During SmartCopy, DeloreanCopy and SmartClone dangling junctions or symlinks will be at least in the same way dangling restored.
  • Multiple source locations can be specified with SmartCopy, DeloreanCopy and SmartClone.
  • SmartRename was introduced.
  • SmartCopy, SmartMirror and DeloreanCopy accept FAT drives as source directory.
  • Support for DeepPath operations in SmartCopy, DeloreanCopy and SmartClone, SmartMove.
  • Fixed a problem in SmartMove which created dangling symbolic links, when using relative symbolic links in certain situations.

item.title: LSE 3.651 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Russian translation updated.
  • Installation notifies about already running processes, which would make LSE installation fail, because they have loaded dlls from LSE.

item.title: LSE 3.650 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Speed improvements during SmartCopy/SmartMirror/HardlinkClone and Delorean Copy.
  • Introduced new Heap Manager Rockall for x64 and x86 builds to gain performance.

item.title: LSE 3.604 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Symlinks creation resulted in absolute symlinks even if creation of syminks was specified as relative, if their common ancestor was a root dir.

item.title: LSE 3.603 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a rare problem with Smartcopying files in root directories, which have been selected alongside directories.
  • Russian translations completed.

item.title: LSE 3.602 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a problem which prevented installation from very scratch to have SmartMirror available in the menue

item.title: LSE 3.601 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed rare glitches in Delorean Copy only called from LSE.

item.title: LSE 3.600 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• With all Smart* functionality, Outer Junctions/Symbolic Links can now be unrolled or spliced.
  • Added SmartMirror.
  • Speed improvements to Smart Copy, Smart Move and Delorean Copy.

item.title: ln.exe 2.59.114 goes beta.
item.content:encoded:
• With all Smart* functionality, Outer Junctions/Symbolic Links can now be unrolled or spliced.
  • Added SmartMirror.
  • Improved logging and statistics..
  • Smart Moves restores timestamps..

item.title: ln.exe 2.550 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Added more powerful options to exclude files/directories via wildcards/regular expressions.
  • Speed improvemened by about 35% since 2.500 (without virus scanner).
  • Changed the regular expression machine to tre-0.8.0.

item.title: LSE 3.500 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Introduced DeLorean Copy, which is a way of creating incremental copies using hardlinks.

item.title: LSE 3.5 went beta and ln.exe 2.5 too
item.description: LSE 3.5 went beta and ln.exe 2.5 too
item.content:encoded:
Link Shellextension went Beta and ln.exe also.
What's new? DeLorean Copy is available in LSE and ln.exe.
What is this? DeLorean Copy is a incremental way of creating backups using hardlinks very similar to Apples TimeMachine(tm). Read the LSE .html doku, you will find out.
The LSE beta phase lasts till November 14th 2010, so please provide me with feedback if possible.

item.title: LSE little sibling can do 'timemachine' functionality for beta testers
item.description: ln.exe wants beta testers for timemachine functionality
item.content:encoded: • ln.exe, the command line sibling of LSE, can do timemachine functionality now in a beta version. Send me an email if you want to test.

item.title: LSE 3.402 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • LSEConfig mixed up the Remote Capabilities bit.

item.title: LSE 3.401 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • fixes a little glitch, that prevented the property dialog to show up in the installed language.

item.title: LSE 3.400 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• LSE now by default creates relative target path names when creating symbolic links.
  • Symbolic Links now have an overlay icon.
  • Added a configuration tool for LSE options
  • Added a priority level for the indidual overlay icons.
  • Added an option to switch of overlay icons totally for each type of overlay.
  • The Pick Link Source context menue now also shows up on FAT drives, if the item potentially is the source for a LSE operation.
  • Overlay icons can be disabled.
  • Documented how the install directory can specified when using silent (un)install.
  • The menu hydraulics have been reworked, so that it is decided early to only show menue for chioces, which are really possible.
  • LSE and symlink are now linked with ASLR.
  • Tranparency glitches in the Junction overlay icon have been fixed.
  • Hardlink Clone and Symboliclink Clone have been extended so that Inner Junctions and inner Symbolic Links are properly handled.
  • LSE now supports also the replacement of Mountpoints and Symbolic Links.
  • LSE shows a dialog box whether explorer should be restarted or not during non silent installation.
  • Under Windows Vista and Window7 the Delete Junction menue doe not show up anymore.

item.title: LSE 3.358 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed the problem of Hardlink Clone stopping unsolictedly after about 500msec.

item.title: LSE 3.357 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • gFlags was not properly read from the HKCU registry, causing Smart Move Disable and Remote capabilities Disable to malfunction.

item.title: LSE 3.356 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Mountpoints could not be properly created under Windows XP.

item.title: LSE 3.355 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Fixed a crash during undeleting files from Recycle Bin.

item.title: LSE 3.354 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Polish localisation added. Thanks to Arthur from Poland.

item.title: LSE 3.353 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • Smart Move progress bar showed a wrong caption text in explorer context.

item.title: LSE 3.351 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a little but crucial flaw in the installer which prevented Smart Move to work on Vista & Windows 7.
  • Hardlink Clone now restores the attributes of cloned folders.
  • Smart Move had a crucial flaw, when just one letter of a folder changed in case.
  • Smart Move was not enabled under Windows 7 during installation.

item.title: LSE 3.350 has been released.
item.content:encoded: • LSE supports Smart Move functionality, which updates inner junctions/symlinks in case of moving/renaming directories

item.title: LSE 3.300 has been released.
item.content:encoded:
• LSE now deals with Symboliclinks during Smart Copy under Vista and Windows 7.
  • Brazilian Portuguese localization added. Thanks to Marcia R.
  • LSE has been adapted to the Windows 7 way of automatically renaming in-place hardlinks/junctions/..., e.g. '$Filename - Hardlink.$ext'.
  • Fixed flaws of the automatically renaming feature with respect to directories under W7
  • Overriding custom overlay icons under HKCU was flawed

item.title: LSE 3.224 has been released.
item.description: LSE released version 3.224 which adds Japanese localization.
item.content:encoded:
• Japanese localization added. Thanks to Taka from Japan.
  • LSE has been adapted to the Windows 7 way of automatically renaming in-place hardlinks/junctions/..., e.g. '$Filename - Hardlink.$ext'.

item.title: LSE 3.222 has been released.
item.description: LSE released version 3.222 which fixes problems with smartcopying whole disks
item.content:encoded:
• Picking a whole drive as source for Smartcopy ended in a weird error message when droping.
  • Drives without name created meaningless directory names after droping as junction/mountpoint/smartcopy like ' (F)' instead of 'Drive (F)'.
  • Files in the root directory of a drive, when selected for smartcopy, were not processed during smartcopy.

item.title: LSE 3.221 has been released.
item.description: LSE released version 3.221 which adds a minor bugfix
item.content:encoded: • With Vista the first 4 letters of the target of a Symbolic Link where cut off at the property dialog.

item.title: LSE 3.220 has been released.
item.description: LSE released version 3.220 which adds a few minor features and bugfixes
item.content:encoded:
• Fixed a few issues with russian localization.
  • Added a progress bar during Symbolic Link Clone operation.
  • Introduced a RSS feed for release info.

item.title: LSE 3.200 has been released.
item.description: LSE version 3.200 released which added progressbars, improved localization...
item.content:encoded:
• Added localisation for Chinese and Russian. Thanks to Zuo Weiming and Ivan(b0s) for the translations.
  • Longer lasting operations, like Smartcopy, Symbolic Link Clone, Hardlink Clone, Enumerate Siblings show a progress bar.
  • The properties dialog of an item offers an 'Explore Target' button for Junctions, Mountpoints and Symbolic Links.
  • The properties dialog for mountpoints shows the drive guid.
